DOC.brief_title: Clinician-Collected Versus Patient-Collected Cervical Pap Smears
DOC.detailed_description: The SoloPap `` kit '' provide subject would otherwise Pap smear do convenient private way collect sample ship laboratory processing . The current study pilot/pre-cursor study large subsequent study aim determine whether SoloPap truly noninferior clinician-collected Pap smear detect cervical pathology . It also determine user preference willingness perform self- test .
